name: Nannys Nightmare
description:
You're a nanny at the nursery. Your task is to bring the children safely to the park. Watch out for pedophiles and other dangers in the city!

This is a real time strategy game, where you need to assemble your children by making them hold hands and / or follow eachother.

There are three different types of children:
Punks: These will give you the most trouble
Angel: Will almost always stay still
Normal: Something in between punk and angel.

Graphics

All the models in this game have been made using paper models which are then disassembled, scanned and recreated in 3D.

  • Programming and 3D-modeling: Thor Merlin Lervik
  • Paper model design: Katarina Caspersen

2017
